original_title: Twelve Transmissions from the Occupied States Orbiting the Sun
overview: An experiment in scifi-abstraction. The Occupied States have long sent messages to the galaxy--these are some of the transmissions received and translated. Questions of occupation, questions of communication, and questions of "which sun?" rise from the grainy visions of unknown worlds.
title: Twelve Transmissions from the Occupied States Orbiting the Sun
